CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES OF AMERICA and UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE, Petitioners, v. UNITED FOODS, INC.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:10 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA McDOWELL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LAURENCE TRIBE ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF BARBARA McDOWELL ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:06 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
